## 2 Take-home exercises

### 2.1 Data exploration

**1. Look at the data ukcars, and describe the structure of this data file. What type of object is ukcars?**

```{r}
ukcars
```

`ukcars` is a time series object. For these objects the correct order of the data points is included in the object. It has 4 columns, each corresponding to one quarter of the year, and the rows are the years it spans over, from 1977 to 2005.
